```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, 
                      fig.align = 'center')

library(tidyverse)

```

# Datos

```{r}
head(iris, 5)
```

# Grafico 

```{r, fig.align='center', fig.height=3, fig.width=5}
ggplot(iris, mapping = aes(x= Sepal.Length, y= Sepal.Width, 
                           color= Species)) +
  geom_point()
```

# Media

La formula de la media es: $$\mu= \frac{\sum_{i= 1}^{n}x_{i}}{n}$$

```{r}
iris %>% group_by(Species) %>% 
  summarise_if(is.numeric, mean)
```
